import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../FormsEstilos/AgregarPaises.css"; import { agregarPaisApi } from "../../../Api/Seguridad/paises"; export default function AgregarPaises() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ codigo: "", nombre: "", foto: "" }); const changeForm = e => { if (e.target.name != "fileFoto") { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } }; const fileSelectedHandler = e => { const i = document.getElementById("imgPais"); let x = URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]); console.log(x); i.src = URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]); inputs.foto = URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]); } const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const result = agregarPaisApi(inputs); } return ( <>
